item.title: Reloading Neovim Config With Telescope
item.description: Recently, I’ve decided to change my Neovim configuration to use Lua. If you want to do it too, this guide has much information about what you need to do. In Lua, when you require a module, it is cached, so next time you require it, you are not getting the changes. The problem with this is that I usually have two open tabs with a few splits each when I’m working.
